book.synopsis: Three hundred years ago, a warlord overthrew the Emperor of Heaven and began a cruel and tyrannical reign, but a prophecy foresaw that Six Stars could bring about his downfall, and Yasha is determined to make the prophecy come true.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.4 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
